featured.text: D. Daniel To me, a zoo can be a good place for endangered species which have difficulty finding suitable mates in the wild.
Your health might thus be endangered.
In the Indian state of Assam, growing numbers of tea farms are destroying the Asian elephant’s habitats and endangering their population.

other.text: Even if an animal is endangered, does that justify restricting its freedom?
Most people probably don’t feel sympathy for these endangered creatures, but they do need protecting.
H. Henry Most animals in zoos are not endangered, nor are they being prepared for release into natural habitats.

definition.en_def: To put someone or something at risk of harm or danger.
definition.example: Pollution can endanger the health of marine life.
